metadata.title: CVE-2017-16837 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Certain function pointers in Trusted Boot (tboot) through 1.9.6 are not validated and can cause arbitrary code execution, which allows local users to overwrite dynamic PCRs of Trusted Platform Module (TPM) by hooking these function pointers.

criterions.comment: tboot package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.7-0ubuntu1').
